name: iLogic VB File
summary: An ILOGICVB file is a file that contains iLogic rule code that is preprocessed by iLogic, a browser included with Autodesk Inventor that is used to standardize and automate design processes. It contains the code for a Visual Basic (VB.NET) program that is used to control or monitor other Inventor features, components, or parameters.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
